00004  * @date    $Date:: 2021-02-26 #$

00006  *************************************************************************************************************

00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "sd_disk.h"
00030 #include "spi_sd.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035 
00036 /** @addtogroup USBD_Examples USBD
00037   * @{
00038   */
00039 
00040 /** @addtogroup Mass_Storage
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 
00045 #if (BOT_SD_DISK0 == 1)
00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define SDISK_READ_BUFFER      (1024 * 4)
00048 
00049 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 typedef enum
00051 {
00052   SDDISK_IDLE  = 0,
00053   SDDISK_READ  = 1,
00054   SDDISK_WRITE = 2,
00055 } SDDISK_Status_Enum;
00056 
00057 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00058 #define CACHE_CNT  (SDISK_READ_BUFFER / SDDISK0_BlockSize)
00059 
00060 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 #if (SDISK_DEBUG == 1)
00062 #define DBG   printf
00063 #else
00064 #define DBG(...)
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 __ALIGN4 static u8 guReadBuffer[SDISK_READ_BUFFER];
00069 __ALIGN4 static u8 guWriteBuffer[SDDISK0_BlockSize];
00070 static u32 guReadBufferOffset;
00071 static u32 guWriteBufferOffset;
00072 static SDDISK_Status_Enum gDiskWriteStatus = SDDISK_IDLE;
00073 
00074 static u32 uCachePage = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00075 static u32 uCurrentBlock = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00076 
00077 u32 bSDDiskUnload = FALSE;
00078 
00079 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00080 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00081   * @brief  Read from SD Disk memory.
00082   * @param  uId: SD Disk ID
00083   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of data buffer
00084   * @param  uBlockAddress: Block Address for read operation
00085   * @param  uLength: Length for read operation
00086   * @retval uResult: TRUE or FALSE
00087   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00088 u32 SDDISK_Read(u32 uId, u8 **pBuffer, u32 uBlockAddress, u32 uLength)
00089 {
00090   u32 uResult = TRUE;
00091 
00092   if (uId == SDDISK0_ID)
00093   {
00094     if ((uBlockAddress / CACHE_CNT != uCachePage / CACHE_CNT) && (uCachePage != uBlockAddress))
00095     {
00096       /* Calculate the cache start address which shall be aligned with the cache size.                      */
00097       uCachePage = (uBlockAddress / CACHE_CNT) * CACHE_CNT;
00098       SD_ReadMultipleBlock(guReadBuffer, uCachePage, SDISK_READ_BUFFER);
00099     }
00100     if ((uCurrentBlock != uBlockAddress) || ((guReadBufferOffset % SDDISK0_BlockSize) == 0))
00101     {
00102       uCurrentBlock = uBlockAddress;
00103       guReadBufferOffset = (uBlockAddress - uCachePage) * SDDISK0_BlockSize;
00104     }
00105     *pBuffer = &(guReadBuffer[guReadBufferOffset]);
00106     guReadBufferOffset += BOT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE;
00107   }
00108   else
00109   {
00110     uResult = FALSE;
00111   }
00112   return uResult;
00113 }
00114 
00115 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00116   * @brief  Write to SD Disk memory.
00117   * @param  uId: SD Disk ID
00118   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of data buffer
00119   * @param  uBlockAddress: Block Address for write operation
00120   * @param  uLength: Length for write operation
00121   * @retval uResult: TRUE or FALSE
00122   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00123 u32 SDDISK_Write(u32 uId, u8 *pBuffer, u32 uBlockAddress, u32 uLength)
00124 {
00125   u32 i;
00126   u32 uResult = TRUE;
00127 
00128   if (uId == SDDISK0_ID)
00129   {
00130     uResult = TRUE;
00131     if (gDiskWriteStatus == SDDISK_IDLE)
00132     {
00133       gDiskWriteStatus = SDDISK_WRITE;
00134       guWriteBufferOffset = 0;
00135     }
00136     for (i = 0; i < uLength; i++)
00137     {
00138       guWriteBuffer[guWriteBufferOffset + i] = *(pBuffer + i);
00139     }
00140     guWriteBufferOffset += uLength;
00141     if (guWriteBufferOffset == SDDISK0_BlockSize)
00142     {
00143       gDiskWriteStatus = SDDISK_IDLE;
00144       SD_WriteBlock(guWriteBuffer, uBlockAddress, SDDISK0_BlockSize);
00145     }
00146   }
00147   else
00148   {
00149     uResult = FALSE;
00150   }
00151 
00152   return uResult;
00153 }
00154 
00155 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00156   * @brief  Get SD Disk Status.
00157   * @param  uId: SD Disk ID
00158   * @param  pSizeInfo: Pointer of media size information
00159   * @retval uResult: TRUE means disk ready for access. FALSE for disk not ready
00160   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00161 u32 SDDISK_GetStatus(u32 uId, BOT_MediaSize_Typedef *pSizeInfo)
00162 {
00163   u32 uResult = TRUE;
00164   u32 uSizeMul;
00165   SD_CSD_TypeDef SDCSD;
00166 
00167   if (bSDDiskUnload)
00168   {
00169     return FALSE;
00170   }
00171 
00172   if (SD_Init() == SD_RESPONSE_ERR)
00173   {
00174     uResult = FALSE;
00175   }
00176   else
00177   {
00178     if (SD_GetCSDRegister(&SDCSD) != SD_RESPONSE_NOERR)
00179     {
00180       uResult = FALSE;
00181     }
00182     else
00183     {
00184       pSizeInfo->uAddressMode = BOT_ADDR_MODE_BLOCK;
00185 
00186       #if (SDHC_SUPPORT == 1)
00187       if (uSD_IsSDHC == TRUE)
00188       {
00189         pSizeInfo->uBlockSize = SDDISK0_BlockSize;
00190         pSizeInfo->uBlockCount = (SDCSD.DeviceSize + 1) * 512 * 2;
00191       }
00192       else
00193       #endif
00194       {
00195         pSizeInfo->uBlockSize = SDDISK0_BlockSize;
00196         uSizeMul = (1 << (SDCSD.DeviceSizeMul + 2)) * ((1 << SDCSD.RdBlockLen) / SDDISK0_BlockSize);
00197         pSizeInfo->uBlockCount = (SDCSD.DeviceSize + 1) * uSizeMul;
00198       }
00199     }
00200   }
00201 
00202   return uResult;
00203 }
00204 
00205 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00206   * @brief  Unmount SD Disk.
00207   * @param  uId: RAM Disk ID
00208   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00209 void SDDISK_Unmount(u32 uId)
00210 {
00211   bSDDiskUnload = TRUE;
00212 }
00213 #endif
